dcterms:creator: M. Bui
S. Albarqouni
M. Schrapp
N. Navab
S. Ilic
dcterms:description: The marked cube X-ray dataset consists of 2,042 manually annotated 8-bit 960×960-pixel grayscale images of a 30×30×30-mm perspex cube embedded with metal markers, captured with a C-arm-based X-ray system. It is used to evaluate the performance of a 6D pose estimation model on X-ray images.
dcterms:title: Marked Cube X-ray Dataset
